basics.name: Hossain Khan
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: Senior Software Engineer with 15+ years of experience, passionate about crafting intuitive interfaces that connect people through technology. Currently at Slack, enhancing the Android app with a focus on Slack's platform improvements like BlockKit, Workflows, Slack Apps, and more. Career began as a web developer and has since evolved into mobile technologies, where I thrive on tackling challenging projects.
